title: Which variables are equal to 50 after assignments

content.question: x <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 25y <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 50z <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 75x <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> yy <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> zz <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> xWhich of the variables have the value 50 after executing the code segment?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
